Package menu

Class Button

java.lang.Object
menu.GenericMenuElement
menu.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
ButtonInterface, GenericMenuElementInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyButton, CloseShopButton, ExitButton, InstructionsButton, LeaderboardButton, MainMenuButton, RestartButton, ResumeButton, ShopButton, StartButton
public abstract class Button extends GenericMenuElement implements ButtonInterface
Extension of generic menu element which represents a button in the game. All buttons do different actions. This specific generic button is abstract, and as such cannot be initialized.

    • execute

      public abstract void execute()
      Description copied from interface: ButtonInterface
